thread.title: Gowdy Defends Sessions and Comey Against Continued Attacks From Democrats
thread.title_full: Gowdy Defends Sessions and Comey Against Continued Attacks From Democrats

author: Katie Pavlich
title: Gowdy Defends Sessions and Comey Against Continued Attacks From Democrats

organizations.name: comey against continued attacks from democrats gowdy defends sessions

text:
Gowdy Defends Sessions and Comey Against Continued Attacks From Democrats Share Share Tweet 
Former prosecutor and South Carolina Congressman Trey Gowdy is defending Attorney   and FBI Director James Comey as Democrats continue to hurl accusations of wrong doing at the two law enforcement officials. 
Yesterday Sessions announced he would recuse himself from any cases surrounding the 2016 presidential election after news broke he met with the Russian ambassador twice last year, but did not say so during his confirmation hearing in January. For Democrats a recusal isn't enough and many, including   Schumer, are calling for a resignation. 
Democrats are also going after FBI Director James Comey for allegedly not providing enough information about Russia interference. Comey briefed Congressmen from appropriate committees yesterday on the issue.
